Sql.query: select aremedcodi, areacodi, aremedfecinicial, aremedfecfinal, aremedestado, aremedfeccreacion, aremedusucreacion, aremedfecmodificacion, aremedusumodificacion from prn_areamedicion

insert into prn_areamedicion( aremedcodi, areacodi, aremedfecinicial, aremedfecfinal, aremedestado, aremedfeccreacion, aremedusucreacion, aremedfecmodificacion, aremedusumodificacion ) values( :areamedcodi, :areacodi, :areamedfecinicial, :areamedfecfinal, :areamedestado, :areamedfeccreacion, :areamedusucreacion, :areamedfecmodificacion, :areamedusumodificacion )

update prn_areamedicion set areacodi = :areacodi, aremedfecinicial = :areamedfecinicial, aremedfecfinal = :areamedfecfinal, aremedestado = :areamedestado, aremedfecmodificacion = :areamedfecmodificacion, aremedusumodificacion = :areamedusumodificacion where aremedcodi = :areamedcodi

select eq_area.areacodi, eq_area.areaabrev, eq_area.areanomb, prn_areamedicion.aremedestado, prn_areamedicion.aremedcodi from eq_area join prn_areamedicion on eq_area.areacodi = prn_areamedicion.areacodi where areaestado = 'A' and anivelcodi = 2
update prn_areamedicion set aremedestado = :areamedestado, aremedfecmodificacion = :areamedfecmodificacion, aremedusumodificacion = :areamedusumodificacion where aremedcodi = :areamedcodi
